snippet.title: Amazing Maze - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description: Amazing Maze is a minimalistic “roll a ball” game where you have to capture all the crystals and find the way out in beautiful handcrafted 3D mazes. Use your creativity and logical thinking to overcome obstacles or use them to your advantage. Play with your friends locally or online (via Steam Remote Play Together)
